name: Goblord
description:
You are the Lord of the Goblins, the Goblord. Your task is to get your goblin army to their goals and steal gold to get rich. But because your Goblins are not smart, you need to help them by telling them when to climb, dig, build or simply NOT fall to their death. They almost seem like lemmings, if you think about it...

Note: This is the final Game of my "4 games in 4 weeks"-Project, you can check out the other three games on my profile as well.
